title: Top Gainers & Losers on Oct 24: Ather Energy, HUL, MCX, Ceat, KPR Mill, Cyient among top losers today
summary: The Indian stock market declined on October 24 as investors took profits after a six-session rally. The Nifty 50 fell 0.37% while the S&amp;P BSE Sensex dropped 0.42%. Metal stocks rose, but private banking led the sell-off, with significant declines in several indices.

title: Sensex, Nifty snap 6-day winning run amid losses in banks: 10 key highlights from Indian stock market today
summary: Profit taking at higher levels and crude price surge pushed the Indian benchmark indices — Sensex and Nifty — lower on Friday after a six-day rally. Bank stocks emerged as the biggest index drags, with HDFC Bank contributing to nearly half of the losses.
